title: Apple will no longer replace your iPhone X when you break Face ID
content:
Apple is famous for the reliable support it provides for its products. Whether it be through the long years of software updates or the hardware repairs at authorized centers, its devices tend to be future-proof. description: Apple has figured out how to repair Face ID on the iPhone X without replacing the whole phone. This had been exclusive to newer models.
